title: Dough Making Machine
description: An efficient machine for kneading dough for various food products.
fullDescription: Heavy-duty dough kneader suitable for commercial kitchens and small-scale industries, ensuring uniform mixing with adjustable speed control and hygienic stainless steel contact parts.

title: Electric Kadhai
description: An efficient machine for cooking food without fire.
fullDescription: Electric tilting kadhai designed for frying, sautéing, and simmering with precise thermostatic control and uniform heat distribution.

title: Papad Machine
description: An efficient machine for making papad.
fullDescription: Semi-automatic papad making machine with adjustable thickness and diameter control, suitable for small and medium production.

title: Coating Flouring Machine
description: An efficient machine for coating the any wafers or chips with masala.
fullDescription: Rotary drum-type seasoning unit for uniform spice or flour coating on chips, wafers, and snacks with adjustable dosing.

title: Potato Chips Machine
description: An efficient machine for cutting potatos to chips.
fullDescription: Commercial potato slicer for uniform chips with interchangeable blades for ripple, straight, and thickness variations.

title: Potato Dryer Machine
description: An efficient machine for drying the potatos after slicing.
fullDescription: Centrifugal hydro dryer to remove surface moisture after washing or slicing, improving frying quality and oil absorption.

title: Potato Piller Machine
description: An efficient machine for Pilling potatos.
fullDescription: Abrasive batch peeler for potatoes and root vegetables with stone lining for efficient skin removal and water inlet.

title: Powder Mixing Machine
description: An efficient machine for Mixing Masalas.
fullDescription: Ribbon blender/masala mixer for homogenous dry powder mixing with safety guards and dust-tight cover.

title: Sandwich Griller
description: A machine designed for grilling and toasting sandwiches efficiently.
fullDescription: Commercial-grade sandwich press with non-stick plates and adjustable temperature for consistent grilling.

title: Sugar Cane Juice Machine
description: A machine designed for extracting juice from sugar cane.
fullDescription: Compact sugarcane juicer with high extraction efficiency and easy cleaning, suitable for stalls and shops.

title: Garlic Peeling Machine
description: A machine designed for peeling garlic efficiently.
fullDescription: Dry-type garlic peeler using compressed air for clean peeling without damaging cloves and with high throughput.

title: Industrial Mixer Grinder
description: A machine designed for grinding and mixing various ingredients.
fullDescription: Heavy-duty mixer grinder for wet and dry applications with overload protection and stainless steel jars.

title: Hammer Pulveriser Machine
description: An efficient machine for Grinding Masalas.
fullDescription: Hammer-type pulveriser for fine grinding of spices, grains, and herbs with cyclone and dust collection.
